body_html:
@mccajm, Cudnn V5 is definitely supported. Your specific problem comes from this line:

E tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_blas.cc:367] failed to create cublas handle: CUBLAS_STATUS_NOT_INITIALIZED

This seems to indicate that the call to cublasCreate_v2 has failed. Please check the Cuda and Cublas installation on your machine. Also adding @jhen, the owner of stream-executor, in case he has more comments.

Please try the simple matrixMulCUBLAS that comes with the Cuda SDK, and see if the Cuda installation itself works well.

This seems to indicate that the call to cublasCreate_v2 has failed. Please check the Cuda and Cublas installation on your machine. Also adding @jhen, the owner of stream-executor, in case he has more comments.
Please try the simple matrixMulCUBLAS that comes with the Cuda SDK, and see if the Cuda installation itself works well.
body:
@mccajm, Cudnn V5 is definitely supported. Your specific problem comes from this line:

> > E tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_blas.cc:367] failed to create cublas handle: CUBLAS_STATUS_NOT_INITIALIZED

This seems to indicate that the call to cublasCreate_v2 has failed. Please check the Cuda and Cublas installation on your machine. Also adding @jhen, the owner of stream-executor, in case he has more comments. 

Please try the simple matrixMulCUBLAS that comes with the Cuda SDK, and see if the Cuda installation itself works well.
